title: PROPERTY DAMAGE
sample_text:
It is hereby understood and agreed that notwithstanding 
anything to the contrary contained in the Policy the Company’s 
liability is limited to Rs. 6000/- (Rupees six thousand only) for 
damage to property other than the property belonging to the 
Insured or held in trust or in custody or control of the Insured
In consideration of this reduction in the limit of liability a 
reduction in premium of Rs…..* is hereby made to the Insured.
Subject otherwise to the terms conditions limitations and 
exceptions of the Policy.
*To insert Rs.50 for Two wheelers, Rs.100 for private cars, Rs.150 
for Com
